      • loadSpriteSheet

        public static SpriteSheet loadSpriteSheet(Texture tex,
                          int divwidth,
                          int divheight)
        Slices the Texture tex up, cutting vertically every divwidth length, and cutting horizontally every divheight length. The subtextures are counted reading left to right.

      • loadSpriteSheet

        public static SpriteSheet loadSpriteSheet(Texture tex,
                          SubTexture... subtexs)
        Returns:
        A spritesheet based off of Texture tex, with SubTextures subtexs.
